talk1420:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>That headband is the last one I have, you
know! If you buy it...

<sp:0:2:2:5000>I'll tell you a super-special secret that even most
Gerudo don't know!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk1421:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>A <clr:0000>desert voe headband<clr:ffff> really is a must!
Not only is it stylish but wearing it takes
some of the bite out of the desert heat!
talk1423: <sp:3:0:2:0700>You didn't mess up your clothes, did you?
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Oh, um... We don't really deal with stuff
like that here...
talk1424:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now you don't have to worry about that
sand shroud messing up your clothes!
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Um... You want to sell me something you
are currently wearing? Maybe you should
change first.
talk1425:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>We're all sold out right now, but we'll
probably restock soon.

Come back and visit us again, OK? There
is no such thing as too many <clr:0000>different
color<clr:ffff> varieties!
talk1426:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Saaaaaarq!<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:4:0>The Secret Club doesn't just have the desert voe
series—they've got other rare items too. You should
definitely swing by.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>I completely understand. It's part of the
fun of shopping to go back and forth
on a purchase.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Huh. Your pouch is full! If you'd like,
I'll buy some things from you!
talk1406:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I sell one of the latest fashion crazes
straight from Gerudo Town!

If you're after the <clr:0000>desert voe headband<clr:ffff>,
you've come to the right place. It used to
be hard for voe to get their hands on it!
talk1407:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Not only is what I sell a fashionable
choice, it's also great at staving off the
desert heat!
Com_Talk_05b:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Please feel free to show me anything
you'd like to sell.
talk1408:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The sand shroud has completely cleared
up!<sp:5:0:0> Seems like as good a time as any to
add to your wardrobe, don't you think?
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Take as much time as you need.
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I've never seen such beautiful items.
Saaarq!
Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm happy to buy as many as you like.
talk1409:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>And even if you've already got one, why
settle for just that one when you could
get another in a <clr:0000>different color<clr:ffff>!
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0801>Is there anything else you want to sell?
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Saaarq!


Since you were kind enough to buy the
last one, I'll keep my promise and tell you
that secret!
<sp:0:2:2:5000><snd:TalkPositive_01>The headband you just bought is only one part of
the desert voe series. There's also a spaulder
and trousers...
But you have to go to a special place to get them.
Have you heard of the store Fashion Passion in
Gerudo Town?
Well, the secret shop is located behind that store!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_04:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><sp:0:2:2:6400>Oh... Now that I think about it...voe aren't
allowed in <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Forget I said anything!<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk1411:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Using dye to change the color of clothes
is a big thing with young vai traveling
around Hyrule.
If you're interested, there's a store in
<clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff> in the eastern edge of
Hyrule—the <clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>.
Hateno Village used to be a quiet,
peaceful little town, you know...

But now it's a tourist hotspot. Some
folks consider it the center for all
things fashionable!
Talk_05:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><sp:0:2:2:6400>Hey, wait a second. You're wearing 
desert voe...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Aww, you already knew about the secret
club! And here I thought I was giving you
a great tip...<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Talk_04: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Oh, of course! No problem at all.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Saaarq! I mean it!


You can never have enough headbands.
You need one for going out, another for
staying in... Oh, and one in every color!
Com_Talk_05: <sp:3:0:2:0801>Would you like to sell me something else?
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh. Um, I'm sorry to tell you this...


The shop is closed for the day. Why don't
you go on home now, Yiga Clan?
talk1417:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That was a close one earlier...<sp:5:0:0> You didn't
mess up your clothes, did you?

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Hey, changing up your look is a good way
to refresh your mood! Think about it!
talk1418:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:CustomVasaaq>Vasaaq!<sp:5:0:0> Ah, that caught your eye, huh?
I knew it!

It's a must-have for any fashionable voe
that is trying to live that hot-desert life!
talk1419:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:CustomVasaaq>Vasaaq!<sp:5:0:0> Ah, that caught your eye, huh?
I knew it!

The sand shroud may be gone, but
the heat isn't going anywhere. Such is
desert life!
